lead_paragraph: Feel like you need a breather from club soccer? Well, you’re in luck. The next nine days are a FIFA international break, so you can exchange your favorite parochial rivalry for a shiny new international one.

headline.main: Live and Kicking: Soccer Games to Watch

snippet: Feel like you need a breather from club soccer? Well, you’re in luck. The next nine days are a FIFA international break, so you can exchange your favorite parochial rivalry for a shiny new international one.
